title: Crystal Healing
cleaned_text: Crystal Healing Crystal healing is a non-invasive holistic, vibrational energy-based method of healing. Is a technique in which intuitively selected crystals are placed either on or around the patient's body. A crystal healer may intuitive place various stones or crystals on the body aligned with the chakra points, roughly in the regions above the head, on the forehead, on the throat, on the chest, on the stomach, on the gut, and on the genital area— to allow positive, healing energy to flow into the body and the negative, disease-causing energy flows out. How Could Crystals Help Me? - Relieve and release stress - Improve your health and rejuvenate your body by stimulating the energy flow through your meridians - Amplify your healing power and potential - Invigorating healing, personal growth and spiritual development - Reinstate the energy structure to your mind and body - Inner levels and Aura re-connection - Promote carrier waves of pure vibrant energy - Stimulate harmonious brain activity - Transmutation of unwanted information that may be blocking you and your body and unconscious mind - Ground you and unite you to Mother Earth What will I experience in my Crystal Healing session? Some experience blocked emotions surfacing in order for them to heal. Some experience physical healing of dis-ease. Some have a more quiet and subtle shifting of energies.
